The primary railway light signals in France are based on six standardized signal head shapes ('''châssis-écrans'''), each with two or more lights capable of displaying different [[OpenRailwayMap/Tagging in France/States|states]] ('''aspects'''). These signal heads and their variations are shown below. Unused light positions are covered, and parasols are not installed.

[[File:SNCF_ID3-type_head_outline.svg|frameless|130px]]

2 or 3-direction indicator.
